forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning, becoming a steady, soaking rain during the afternoon hours with a few rumbles of thunder possible. High 18C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early will become a steadier rain for the afternoon with a rumble of thunder possible. High around 65F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with a few thunderstorms early, then mainly cloudy after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with a few thunderstorms early, then mainly cloudy after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming windy with showers developing later in the day. High 19C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 67F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 56F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 69F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
